name: Sakura
description: A full end to end managed luxury rentals business building the finest collection of homes in the world.

team.name: Jonny Tindal
team.bioHtml: Specialises in building, go-to-market, transformation - A Commercial leader at heart. SaaS, Traveltech, HRTech, Proptech, TECH!

jobs.title: Property Acquisition Ambassadors - Alternative Accommodation
jobs.description:
Our team of Property Acquisition Ambassadors are based in various locations around the globe with a sole focus of referring wonderful properties to add to the Sakura collection. 

This role works well for applicants who are not looking for full time work, require flexibility and have strong networks of UHNW/HNW individuals, great personalities and excellent relationship building skills. 

**Responsibilities **

* Promoting the Skaura brand to your personal and professional network 
* Sharing the benefits of listing with Sakura Homes 
* Signing up new properties to the collection 
* Building the brand in your market with a view of leading this market in the future 

**Requirements**

* Experience in sales 
* Superb EQ and relationship building skills 
* Entreprenurial with a passion for startups 
* A passion for beautiful property 

**Deal**

* Property Acquisition Ambassadors work on a comission basis, for every property that joins the collection the ambassador will receive commission (Roughly £200-£250/$250-$300 dependant on the market) 
* For properties commanding over $5000 per night we offer a share of the commission on the first booking. 
* We do not expect you to work many hours, this is totally flexible and a pure sales role 
* The goal is acquisition, simple 

**Why now? **

Post COVID-19 Alternative Accommodation is set to boom. When renting an entire property it offers the client everything they need to continue their lives as close to normal as is possible. The space, cleanliness and peace of mnd is perfectly aligned with the new world we are stepping into and we are building the foundations to tackle it head on.
